content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5 y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5 y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Pipe system at position(x=107.5 y=-34.5)
Consists of pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
-  Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have fuel before starting operations
-  Check the status of entities regularly to avoid downtime due to lack of fuel

### Errors when entities are not connected
-  Ensure that steam engines are connected to the power grid before starting operations
-  Check the status of entities regularly to avoid downtime due to lack of connection

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
-  Ensure that burner inserters have source items before starting operations
-  Check the status of entities regularly to avoid downtime due to lack of source items

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
-  Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before starting operations
-  Check the status of entities regularly to avoid downtime due to lack of ingredients

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables have been defined or assigned in the given execution logs.
